desc: Bondi Peak sun visors are designed for all day wear all summer long. A fashionable accessory for sport, beach or everyday wear in a range of premium fabrics and colours, including wool, denim and linen in black, dusty pink, hot pink, denim blue, or white. Shading you effortlessly from the hot Australian sun.

layout.text:
Go smart & sassy with our classic Notts Ave curved peak visor
or carefree & fun-loving with our Hall St flat peak visor.
